title: Where is the USB2 OTG port on the Raspberry Pi 4 Model B located (USB, Pi 4, gadget, Raspberry Pi)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Its the USBC port that is usually used as a power input. My understanding is that to use it you would need to power the R Pi 4 from the GPIO pins.
I don't think it has one. Its power input is a USB Type C, and it has 2 USB2 and 2 USB3 ports. I think the Type C input is power only.
